p: Mice were sacrificed by CO 2 inhalation, the chest cavity was opened and skin and muscle around the neck were gently removed to expose the trachea. A catheter was inserted and the lungs were carefully flushed with 1 mL PBS via the trachea. The BALF was transferred into a 1.5 ml tube and stored on ice. The BALF was centrifuged at 500x g at 4°C for 10 min. The supernatant was aliquoted and stored at -80°C until further analysis.
